Email is in fact used in this way in some applications, for example
posting=
 a new entry on a blog or a group, getting messages from a
group.

I think =
HTTP is more powerful than email protocols for general
applications. If  "a=
sync" is emphasized, then MQ's are the thing to be
compared with.

Dong
